vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in EtherStore.withdrawFunds (patch_19.sol#13-25):
	External calls:
	- msg.sender.call.value(_weiToWithdraw)() (patch_19.sol#20-24)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (patch_19.sol#21)
	- lastWithdrawTime (patch_19.sol#22)
	- locked (patch_19.sol#23)

vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function depositFunds() public payable {
        balances[msg.sender] += msg.value;
